kenticocommunity.qandaanswerdata.QAndAAnswerDataContent:
Good question!
It is [still required](https://docs.kentico.com/x/6ILWCQ) in Xperience by Kentico, not because of any technical limitations but because of prioritization of other features and improvements.
We do plan to remove the dependency in the future!
We have [collected feedback](https://roadmap.kentico.com/tabs/5-released) about the Form Builder and jQuery and that helps with prioritization. If you'd like to see it removed, go ahead and submit some feedback about what improvements you'd like to see for the Form Builder!
